title: Space Y
description: Space Y is a social media web application in progress, built using React, Redux, MongoDB, Firebase, and Express Js. With a dynamic user interface, seamless data storage, real-time updates, and secure messaging, it redefines online social interactions.

title: Cholan Shop
description: Cholan Shop, an E-Commerce site in progress, combines the power of Next.js and Redux with MongoDB for robust data management. The implementation of Tailwind CSS ensures a sleek and responsive design, underscoring a commitment to cutting-edge technologies for an innovative and seamless user experience.

title: Cholan Store
description: Cholan Store a unified admin panel for Cholan Shop using Next.js, Redux, Typescript, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS.  This cohesive approach ensures smooth communication between the Cholan Shop E-Commerce site and its admin interface, creating an integrated and efficient system.

title: SkinnyFy
description: Space Y is a social media web application in progress, built using React, Redux, MongoDB, Firebase, and Express Js. With a dynamic user interface, seamless data storage, real-time updates, and secure messaging, it redefines online social interactions.
